long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you depends on USD price in you day by day and have to get this information visiting financial sites, Dollert will save you a lot of time. Just enter the USD prices you are looking for and Dollert will notify you when one of those prices get reached.
